name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.resource.checked.volumes.minimum
description: The minimum number of redundant NameNode storage volumes required.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.encrypted.key.cache.expiry
description:
Cache expiry time for a Key, after which the cache Queue for this
    key will be dropped. Default = 12hrs

name: dfs.qjournal.new-epoch.timeout.ms
description:
Timeout in milliseconds when getting an epoch number for write
    access to JournalNodes.

name: dfs.namenode.lease-hard-limit-sec
description: Determines the namenode automatic lease recovery interval in seconds.

name: dfs.datanode.peer.metrics.min.outlier.detection.samples
description:
Minimum number of packet send samples which are required to qualify for outlier detection.
      If the number of samples is below this then outlier detection is skipped.

name: dfs.datanode.slow.io.warning.threshold.ms
description:
The threshold in milliseconds at which we will log a slow
    io warning in a datanode. By default, this parameter is set to 300
    milliseconds.
